name: Ritual Beast Tamer Zefrawendi
text:
[ MONSTER EFFECT ]
When this card is Normal or Pendulum Summoned: You can add 1 face-up "Zefra" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand, except "Ritual Beast Tamer Zefrawendi".
You can only Special Summon "Ritual Beast Tamer Zefrawendi(s)" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
[ PENDULUM EFFECT ]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Ritual Beast" and "Zefra" monsters.
This effect cannot be negated.
